channel.title: Brothers Server Banned?
channel.description:
Ok im an admin on Phatscape.no-ip.biz and its my brother's server and he [b][i]DOESNT SELL ADMIN OR MOD[/i][/b] and he tryed to post and it told he was banned.. I should know if he sold admin or mod cause im his brother. He didnt sell admin or mod and he didnt break any rules. So y is he banned...
Me and him are both pretty pissed because some stupid mod is just banning servers for no reason.
Please unban my server :( phatscapebeta.no-ip.biz :( ask any1 who played... i didnt ever sell admin or mod...

item.description:
@ersertaz wrote:

brothers cant be friends??

he put the Please unban my server… …i didnt ever sell admin or mod…[br][size=1]Posted on: August 23, 2007, 07:47:49 PM[/size][hr]and check the title. :F[br][size=1]Posted on: August 23, 2007, 07:48:29 PM[/size][hr]every1 taht post on this topic go and look on all pages of the Server Reports. its not there.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 23, 2007, 07:49:23 PM[/size][hr]dont care if its quad reply so dont even tell me.

item.title: Brothers Server Banned?
item.dc:creator: @Super_Novex Super Novex
item.description:
@Super_Novex wrote:

Read the following…

Friends Server Banned... ...its my brother's server... ...Please unban [b][i]my[/i][/b] server... ...[b][i]i[/i][/b] didnt ever sell admin or mod...

So there are three different people involved in this story? { insert ROFL here }

item.title: Brothers Server Banned?
item.dc:creator: @mage_owner mage_owner
item.description:
@mage_owner wrote:

title says friend…explanation says its his brother…

[quote=“ersertaz, post:1, topic:136380”]Ok im an admin on Phatscape.no-ip.biz and its my brother’s server and he DOESNT SELL ADMIN OR MOD and he tryed to post and it told he was banned… I should know if he sold admin or mod cause im his brother. He didnt sell admin or mod and he didnt break any rules. So y is he banned…

Me and him are both pretty pissed because some stupid mod is just banning servers for no reason.[/quote]
and at the end he says

ersertaz:

Please unban my server phatscapebeta.no-ip.biz ask any1 who played… i didnt ever sell admin or mod…

Read full topic

item.title: Brothers Server Banned?
item.dc:creator: @moparsc4p3 moparsc4p3
item.description:
@moparsc4p3 wrote:

CopyRight:

Your title doesnt match your explanation… Friend is not a Brother.

Good point.

And if you get banned theres a 99.9999999% chance it was by mistake.
So you and your friend or brother W.E broke a rule or you would not be banned from it.
AND OF STORY.

Read full topic
